attributes.action: Mrs May resign, You haven't got that sense of authority, forget 'sense of duty'.
attributes.additional_details: I worry we are heading into disaster if we continue this in-pass in negotiations, We need real strength in character, Mrs May does not appear to have this.
attributes.background:
We need a strong leader for the Brexit deal to get best deal for us, You are serving no one but yourself if you continue to stay in post.
I don t blame you for the unfortunate circumstances last Wednesday but you should have prepared much better. No interviews etc.
Please step aside!

rejection.details: Resignation is a decision made by an individual, not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
